# Residential Cleaning

#### No Mess.  
Less Stress.

"Good enough" is not an option for us! For a professional cleaning service in Chicagoland that gets the job done right, contact The Heiser Group today.

## Residential Cleaning FAQ's

What areas do you serve in the Chicagoland area?

We serve the all of the Chicagoland area, providing professional cleaning services to homeowners and renters alike. Whether you live in the heart of downtown or the surrounding suburbs, we are here to cater to your cleaning needs. With our local presence and expertise, you can trust that we understand the unique cleaning requirements of the Chicagoland area. Sit back, relax, and let us take care of your cleaning needs, leaving your home clean, fresh, and inviting.

‍

Is professional carpet cleaning effective?

Yes, professional carpet cleaning is highly effective in removing dirt, stains and odors from your carpets. Through specialized techniques and a professional strength formula, carpet cleaning can improve the air quality in your home by eliminating allergens and bacteria that may be trapped in the carpet fibers.

What is the difference between carpet cleaning and upholstery cleaning?

Carpet cleaning refers to cleaning carpet, while upholstery cleaning refers to cleaning fabric of furniture.

Should I hire a professional carpet cleaner?

Hiring a professional carpet cleaner is highly recommended if you want to ensure the best possible results and extend the lifespan of your carpets. With our expertise and specialized equipment, we can tackle even the toughest stains and dirt, leaving your carpets looking fresh and rejuvenated.

Is professional carpet cleaning better than doing it yourself?

While a DIY mixture of warm water and cleaner may seem like a cost-effective option, professional carpet cleaning offers several advantages. Professional carpet cleaners have access to powerful equipment and specialized cleaning solutions that can effectively remove deep-seated dirt, stubborn stains and unpleasant odors. Professionals are also trained in proper carpet cleaning techniques, ensuring a thorough and efficient job.

DIY carpet cleaning often involves renting or purchasing less powerful machines that may not provide the same level of cleanliness. When using a new cleaning solution or unique blend, it is recommended to test it on an inconspicuous area for color fastness. Using incorrect cleaning solutions can lead to damage to your carpets or ineffective results.

Professional carpet cleaning also saves you time and effort. Cleaning your carpets yourself can be a time-consuming task, especially if you have a large area to cover.

What is the best kind of professional carpet cleaning?

The best kind of professional carpet cleaning is one that combines powerful cleaning machines, skilled technicians and specially formulated cleaning solutions without synthetic fragrances. This ensures a thorough and deep clean, removing dirt, stains, bacteria and odors from your carpets. The Heiser Group takes pride in providing top-quality carpet cleaning services that are both effective and safe.

‍

How long does the carpet take to dry after professional shampooing?

The drying time for carpets after professional shampooing can vary depending on various factors, such as humidity, ventilation, soil and carpet thickness. On average, carpets typically take around 4–6 hours to dry completely.

‍

Is professional carpet shampooing safe for pets and children?

Yes, professional carpet shampooing is safe for pets and children when done by a reputable company like The Heiser Group. To avoid any slips or falls, it is recommended to keep pets and children away from freshly cleaned carpets until they have dried completely.

‍

What do professionals use to clean carpets?

Professionals use a combination of powerful carpet cleaning machines and specially formulated cleaning solutions. These machines work by injecting hot water and cleaning solution into the carpet fibers, agitating them to loosen dirt and stains. The machines then extract the dirty water, leaving your carpets fresh and clean. Professionals may also use a spot treatment for a tough stain, such as a pet stain, and high-powered extraction tools for thorough rinsing.

‍
